attributes.action: Let's keep Christmas special - shop and public Christmas decorations should only be on display from Decmber the 1st!
attributes.additional_details:
Isn't it time to put Christmas back where it belongs, from the opening of the advent calendar on December the 1st to the last of the twelve days after little baby Jesus was born?

We propose to make it an offense for shops and councils to put up Christmas displays before December the 1st, and to keep Christmas special. I'm also looking at you Coca Cola, adverts with Santa in November, you should be ashamed!!!!
